operators.func:
; ModuleID = 'id'
source_filename = "id"

; Function Attrs: alwaysinline norecurse nounwind
define void @cfuncnotuniquename(<{ i64, i64 }>* nocapture %.1, i64 %.2, i64 %.3, i64 %.4, i64 %.5) local_unnamed_addr #0 {
entry:
  %.36.i = add nsw i64 %.4, %.2
  %.70.i = add nsw i64 %.5, %.3
  %.1.repack3 = bitcast <{ i64, i64 }>* %.1 to i64*
  store i64 %.36.i, i64* %.1.repack3, align 1
  %.1.repack1 = getelementptr inbounds <{ i64, i64 }>, <{ i64, i64 }>* %.1, i64 0, i32 1
  store i64 %.70.i, i64* %.1.repack1, align 1
  ret void
}

attributes #0 = { alwaysinline norecurse nounwind }

  %.70.i = add nsw i64 %.5, %.3
  %.1.repack3 = bitcast <{ i64, i64 }>* %.1 to i64*
